pageDescription: Julio Sepia's resume - Frontend development, UX prototyping and UI design
title: Julio Sepia
subtitle: Sr. Design technologist
bio: I'm Julio, a jack-of-all-trades frontend developer with professional experience in graphic design, UX design, web application development, and game programming. I'm constantly amazed by the ever-improving capabilities of the web and I enjoy being an early adopter of new technologies. As a design technologist, I work closely with stakeholders to design, research, and prototype effective user experiences.
